results.name: stockport-food-standards
results.notes: Dataset containing food hygeine data for establishments in Stockport. Further information on the calculation of food hygeine ratings can be found in the technical documentation below.
results.title: Stockport Food Standards

res_description: The XML file for food hygiene results in Calderdale. This is available on the Food Standards agency website.
UK food hygiene results on the open data section on the Food Standards Agency website. **Please click on the download button to be taken straight to the website.**
Link to the results of food safety inspections for Calderdale. **Please click on the download button to be taken straight to the website.**
Visualisation of open geographic datasets published on Open Street Map,  [Data Mill North](http://datamillnorth.org/)  and  [Calderdale Dataworks](https://dataworks.calderdale.gov.uk/).
results of food safety inspections for Calderdale on the Scores on the Doors website

This link will create a CSV file all of the registered food premises in Calderdale which also includes the food hygiene ratings. As this is a direct link to the site it will update automatically with the latest data. You may need to use Google Chrome for the file to load.
ODI Leeds project to develop a tool which uses your device's location to display the nearest food premises along with their ratings.

results.name: food-hygiene-ratings2
results.notes:
Details of all of the food hygiene ratings for premises that have been inspected in Calderdale. This dataset includes links to create a CSV file, and links directly to the raw data on the Food Standards Agency website and also has links to the Scores on the Doors website and data via an API in XML format.

The National Food Hygiene Rating Scheme is linked with most of the councils in England and is run by the Food Standards Agency. The rating system is based on the structure, hygiene practices and management controls within the food business. The ratings go from a hygiene rating of five (excellent) to zero (very poor). The information provided on businesses is updated at least every 27 days.
results.title: Food Hygiene Ratings
